task.title: Remove Typewriter From Case
task.shortdesc: Portable Smith Corona machines will typically come in a popular case known as the “Holiday Case.” It is a bit larger than normal typewriter carriers, and has the ability of being disassembled.

step.cmd: Place the typewriter case down on a level surface, with the thinner side of the case on the bottom.
Press the double safety lock to open the case.
Push the machine release button back, towards the carriage return, to release the machine from the case.
Lift the front side of the machine upwards, 2 to 3 inches, and pull the typewriter towards yourself, away from the hinges of the case.
